mwoauth-consumer-grantshelp: Enyemaka na-enye ohere ịnweta ikike nke akaụntụ onye ọrụ gị nwere. Ịkwanye onyinye ebe a anaghị enye ohere ịnweta ikike ọ bụla nke akaụntụ onye ọrụ gị na-agaghị enwe ma ọ bụghị. Hụ [[Special:ListGrants|tebụ onyinye onyinye]] maka ozi ndị ọzọ. Akara akara onyinye dị ize ndụ. Enyemaka enweghị akara na-esikarị ike ịmebi ihe mgbe onye nwere ebumnuche ọjọọ wetara ngwa ahụ. Enwere ike iji onyinye nwere ihe egwu imebi ihe () iji kpata ọgba aghara nke na-ewe nnukwu mbọ iji hichaa. Enyemaka nwere ihe egwu nchekwa () nwere ike ibute mmerụ ahụ na-adịgide adịgide (dịka izu ohi data nkeonwe). Enyemaka nke ime () bụ naanị onye na-ahụ maka saịtị na-eji ya eme ihe, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ anabataghị arịrịọ maka ha. Biko arịọla onyinye dị ize ndụ ma ọ bụrụ na ị chọrọ ha n'ezie.
logentry-mwoauthconsumer-propose-autoapp: $1 {{GENDER:$2|atụpụtara}} onye ahịa OAuth ( igodo ahịa $4) ma kwado ya ozugbo.
log-action-filter-mwoauthconsumer-propos: Amụma ndị ahịa OAuth (mmanye na-akpaghị aka)
mwoauth-oauth2-error-server-error: Ihe nkesa ikike ahụ zutere ọnọdụ a na-atụghị anya ya nke gbochiri ya imezu arịrịọ ahụ. Ozi nbipu: $1
